TM

5 7 1
0 1 x y #
0 (7,0,S) (7,1,S) (7,x,S) (7,y,S) (5,#,R) 
1 (7,0,S) (2,x,R) (1,#,R) (6,1,R) (8,#,S)
2 (7,0,S) (3,1,R) (2,x,R) (2,y,R) (4,y,L)
3 (7,0,S) (2,x,R) (3,x,R) (3,y,R) (4,y,L)
4 (7,0,S) (4,1,L) (4,x,L) (4,y,L) (1,#,R)
5 (7,0,S) (1,#,R) (7,x,S) (7,y,S) (7,#,S)
6 (7,0,S) (7,1,S) (7,x,S) (6,1,R) (8,#,S)
